A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson's sequel to JJ Abrams The Force Awakens can easily be described by a line that Luke Skywalker says in the trailer \"This is not going to go the way you think\". In some aspects\, the unpredictability and the suspense are a good thing for this movie\, however\, some characters are changed in ways that don't stay true to who we think they are which may upset some.
